endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all supported products with detailed nutritional information.
Fetch detailed nutritional data for a specific product identified by its UPC code.
List all product categories and their descriptions available in the API.
Retrieve products belonging to a specific category identified by categoryId.
Get ingredient information for the given product identified by its UPC.
Retrieve allergen information for the specific product identified by its UPC.
Fetch regulation labels like 'Gluten-Free' or 'Organic' for the given product.
Compare the nutritional values and ingredients of two products by their UPC codes.
Submit feedback or corrections regarding a specific product.
Retrieve the current version of the API for compatibility checks.
